title: DeleteActivity
name: DeleteActivity
description: Simply deletes an activity within an organization. If the activity does not exist, the endpoint will output an error.

title: GetActivity
name: GetActivity
description: Given a the id of a specific activity within an organization, it's possible to extract the details of that activity.

Success 200.description: The requested activity
UUID of the activity for the system
Time that the activity occurred
The typing profile associated with the activity
The type of the activity, can be one of ['LOCK', 'UNLOCK', 'INFO', 'LOGOUT', 'LOGIN', "NEW_PROFILE"]
Who initiated this activity, can be one of ['CLIENT', 'ADMIN']

title: ListActivities
name: ListActivities
description: Get a list of all activities for the requesting user's organization. The requesting user will not be able to request activities outside of the organization.

Success 200.description: The requested activities
UUID of the activity for the system
Time that the activity occurred
The typing profile associated with the activity
The type of the activity, can be one of ['LOCK', 'UNLOCK', 'INFO', 'LOGOUT', 'LOGIN', "NEW_PROFILE"]
Who initiated this activity, can be one of ['CLIENT', 'ADMIN']

title: PostActivity
name: PostActivity
description: The requesting user is able to create a new activity within an organization.

Parameter.description: The requested activity
Time that the activity occurred
The typing profile associated with the activity
The type of the activity, can be one of ['LOCK', 'UNLOCK', 'INFO', 'LOGOUT', 'LOGIN', "NEW_PROFILE"]
Who initiated this activity, can be one of ['CLIENT', 'ADMIN']

Success 200.description: The requested activity
UUID of the activity for the system
Time that the activity occurred
The typing profile associated with the activity
The type of the activity, can be one of ['LOCK', 'UNLOCK', 'INFO', 'LOGOUT', 'LOGIN', "NEW_PROFILE"]
Who initiated this activity, can be one of ['CLIENT', 'ADMIN']

title: UpdateActivity
name: UpdateActivity
description: The requesting user is able to update an existing activity within an organization. The endpoint will output an error if the activity does not exist.

Parameter.description: The requested activity
Time that the activity occurred
The typing profile associated with the activity
The type of the activity, can be one of ['LOCK', 'UNLOCK', 'INFO', 'LOGOUT', 'LOGIN', "NEW_PROFILE"]
Who initiated this activity, can be one of ['CLIENT', 'ADMIN']

Success 200.description: The requested activity
UUID of the activity for the system
Time that the activity occurred
The typing profile associated with the activity
The type of the activity, can be one of ['LOCK', 'UNLOCK', 'INFO', 'LOGOUT', 'LOGIN', "NEW_PROFILE"]
Who initiated this activity, can be one of ['CLIENT', 'ADMIN']

title: DeleteAnalysisResult
name: DeleteAnalysisResult
description: Delete an analysis result. If the analysis result does not exist, the endpoint outputs an error. Requires admin permissions.

title: GetAnalysisResults
name: GetAnalysisResults
description: Get a specific analysis result when its id is provided

Success 200.description: UUID of of the specific analysis result
The probability attached to the result
The time that the analysis result was created
The typing profile that submitted the analysis results

title: ListAnalysisResults
name: ListAnalysisResults
description: Get a list of all analysis results of a given specific id.

Success 200.description: UUID of of the specific analysis result
The probability attached to the result
The time that the analysis result was created
The typing profile that submitted the analysis results

title: PostAnalysisResult
name: PostAnalysisResult
description: Create a new analysis result and post it.

Parameter.description: The probability attached to the result
The time that the analysis result was created
The typing profile that submitted the analysis results

Success 200.description: UUID of of the specific analysis result
The probability attached to the result
The time that the analysis result was created
The typing profile that submitted the analysis results

title: UpdateAnalysisResult
name: UpdateAnalysisResult
description: Update an existing analysis result. If the analysis result does not exist, the endpoint outputs an error. Requires admin permissions.

Parameter.description: The probability attached to the result
The time that the analysis result was created
The typing profile that submitted the analysis results

Success 200.description: UUID of of the specific analysis result
The probability attached to the result
The time that the analysis result was created
The typing profile that submitted the analysis results

title: Login
name: Login
description: End point for users to login. Users are granted a JSON web token to be used on authenticated network calls.

Parameter.description: The user's email
The user's password

Success 200.description: A JSON web token to be used on following requests.

title: Register
name: Register
description: End point for users to register for the system. Users are granted a JSON web token to be used on authenticated network calls.

Parameter.description: The user's name
The user's email
The user's password

Success 200.description: A JSON web token to be used on following requests.

title: Register for Organization
name: Register_for_Organization
description: End point for users to register under a particular organization. Users are granted a JSON web token to be used on authenticated network calls.

Parameter.description: The user's name
The user's email
The user's password

Success 200.description: A JSON web token to be used on following requests.

title: DeleteKeystroke
name: DeleteKeystroke
description: Delete a keystroke. Requires admin permissions.

title: GetKeystroke
name: GetKeystroke
description: Get a specific keystroke when its id is provided.

Success 200.description: The requested keystroke
UUID of the keystroke for the system.
The key that was pressed/released.
The time that the keystroke occurred.
Specifies whether the key was pressed or released. One of {"U", "D"}
The typing profile that submitted the keystoke.

title: ListKeystrokes
name: ListKeystrokes
description: Get a list of all keystrokes from a specific organization

Success 200.description: UUID of the keystroke for the system.
The key that was pressed/released.
The time that the keystroke occurred.
Specifies whether the key was pressed or released.
The typing profile that submitted the keystoke.

title: PostKeystroke
name: PostKeystroke
description: Create a new keystroke.

Parameter.description: The key that was newly pressed/released.
The time that the new keystroke occurred.
Specifies whether the key was pressed or released.
The typing profile that submitted the new keystoke.

Success 200.description: The requested keystroke
UUID of the keystroke for the system.
The key that was pressed/released.
The time that the keystroke occurred.
Specifies whether the key was pressed or released. One of {"U", "D"}
The typing profile that submitted the keystoke.

title: UpdateKeystroke
name: UpdateKeystroke
description: Update a keystroke. Requires admin permissions.

Parameter.description: The key that was newly pressed/released.
The time that the new keystroke occurred.
Specifies whether the key was pressed or released.
The typing profile that submitted the new keystoke.

Success 200.description: The requested keystroke
UUID of the keystroke for the system.
The key that was pressed/released.
The time that the keystroke occurred.
Specifies whether the key was pressed or released. One of {"U", "D"}
The typing profile that submitted the keystoke.

title: DeleteMachine
name: DeleteMachine
description: Deletes an machine within an organization. Must provide the machine's id. If the machine does not exist, the endpoint outputs an error.

title: GetMachine
name: GetMachine
description: This endpoint returns the object of a specific machine when provided its id.

Success 200.description: The requested machine
UUID of the machine for the system.
The machine's unique MAC address.
The organization that the machine is assigned to.

title: ListMachines
name: ListMachines
description: Get a list of all machines in the administrator's organization.

Success 200.description: The requested machine
UUID of the machine for the system.
The machine's unique MAC address.
The organization that the machine is assigned to.

title: PostMachine
name: PostMachine
description: Creates a new machine for an already existing organization.

Parameter.description: The machine's unique MAC address.
The organization that the machine is assigned to.

Success 200.description: The requested machine
UUID of the machine for the system.
The machine's unique MAC address.
The organization that the machine is assigned to.

title: UpdateMachine
name: UpdateMachine
description: Update a machine an existing machine which is accessed via its id. If the machine does not exist, the endpoint outputs an error.

Parameter.description: The machine's unique MAC address.
The organization that the machine is assigned to.

Success 200.description: The requested machine
UUID of the machine for the system.
The machine's unique MAC address.
The organization that the machine is assigned to.

title: DeleteOrganization
name: DeleteOrganization
description: Delete a specific organization. If the organization does not exist, the endpoint will output an error.

title: GetOrganization
name: GetOrganization
description: Get a specific organization when providing its id. This doesn't make sense, however, since organizations are created with the founding user.

Success 200.description: UUID of the organization for the system.
The organization's unique name.
The number of users that the organization may have.
The default challenge strategies for typing profiles in the organization.

title: ListOrganizations
name: ListOrganizations
description: Get the details of the organization of the requesting user. Does not return all the existing organizations because that wouldn't make sense.

Success 200.description: UUID of the organization for the system.
The organization's unique name.
The number of users that the organization may have.
The default challenge strategies for typing profiles in the organization.

title: PostOrganization
name: PostOrganization
description: This allows the user to create a new organization

Parameter.description: The organization's unique name.
The number of users that the organization may have.
The default challenge strategies for typing profiles in the organization.

Success 200.description: UUID of the organization for the system.
The organization's unique name.
The number of users that the organization may have.
The default challenge strategies for typing profiles in the organization.

title: UpdateOrganization
name: UpdateOrganization
description: Update the details of a specific organization given its id.

Parameter.description: The organization's unique name.
The number of users that the organization may have.
The default challenge strategies for typing profiles in the organization.

Success 200.description: UUID of the organization for the system.
The organization's unique name.
The number of users that the organization may have.
The default challenge strategies for typing profiles in the organization.

title: DeleteTypingProfile
name: DeleteTypingProfile
description: Delete a typing profile

title: GetTypingProfile
name: GetTypingProfile
description: Get a specific typing profile when an id is provided

Success 200.description: The user that the typing profile is associated with.
The machine that the typing profile is assigned to.
The lock status of the typing profile.
The tensor flow model of the typing profile.
The sqs endpoint of the typing profile.
The challenge strategies of the typing profile.
The last time the typing profile was checked

title: ListTypingProfiles
name: ListTypingProfiles
description: Get a list of all typingProfiles for an existing user in the administrator's organization.

Success 200.description: The user that the typing profile is associated with.
The machine that the typing profile is assigned to.
The lock status of the typing profile.
The tensor flow model of the typing profile.
The sqs endpoint of the typing profile.
The challenge strategies of the typing profile.
The last time the typing profile was checked

title: PostHeartBeat
name: PostHeartbeat
description: Recieves a hearbeat request from the client to verify client is online and secure.

Parameter.description: The user that the typing profile is associated with.
The machine that the typing profile is assigned to.
The lock status of the typing profile.
The tensor flow model of the typing profile.
The sqs endpoint of the typing profile.
The challenge strategies of the typing profile.
The last time the typing profile was checked

Success 200.description: The user that the typing profile is associated with.
The machine that the typing profile is assigned to.
The lock status of the typing profile.
The tensor flow model of the typing profile.
The sqs endpoint of the typing profile.
The challenge strategies of the typing profile.
The last time the typing profile was checked

title: PostMachineTypingProfile
name: PostMachineTypingProfile
description: Create a new machine and/or typing profile if they do not exist. If they do, then get the typing profile given a user's token and machine mac.

Success 200.description: The user that the typing profile is associated with.
The machine that the typing profile is assigned to.
The lock status of the typing profile.
The tensor flow model of the typing profile.
The sqs endpoint of the typing profile.
The challenge strategies of the typing profile.
The last time the typing profile was checked

title: PostTypingProfile
name: PostTypingProfile
description: Creates a new typing profile for an existing user within an organization.

Parameter.description: The user that the typing profile is associated with.
The machine that the typing profile is assigned to.
The lock status of the typing profile.
The tensor flow model of the typing profile.
The sqs endpoint of the typing profile.
The challenge strategies of the typing profile.
The last time the typing profile was checked

Success 200.description: The user that the typing profile is associated with.
The machine that the typing profile is assigned to.
The lock status of the typing profile.
The tensor flow model of the typing profile.
The sqs endpoint of the typing profile.
The challenge strategies of the typing profile.
The last time the typing profile was checked

title: UpdateTypingProfile
name: UpdateTypingProfile
description: Update a typing profile. Enqueues an SQS job.

Parameter.description: The user that the typing profile is associated with.
The machine that the typing profile is assigned to.
The lock status of the typing profile.
The tensor flow model of the typing profile.
The sqs endpoint of the typing profile.
The challenge strategies of the typing profile.
The last time the typing profile was checked

Success 200.description: The user that the typing profile is associated with.
The machine that the typing profile is assigned to.
The lock status of the typing profile.
The tensor flow model of the typing profile.
The sqs endpoint of the typing profile.
The challenge strategies of the typing profile.
The last time the typing profile was checked

title: DeleteUser
name: DeleteUser
description: End point to delete a specific user.

title: GetUser
name: GetUser
description: Gets a specific user's information when provided their id.

Success 200.description: The user object being created/updated
The user's new name
The user's new email
The user's new phone number
The user's new organization
(Optional) The user's new and unique Google Authentication Key
The user's new isAdmin state
UUID of the activity for the system

Errors.description: Unauthorized. You do not have permission to access this data.

title: ListUsers
name: ListUsers
description: Get a list of all existing users in the administrator's organization.

Success 200.description: The users array being created/updated
The user's new name
The user's new email
The user's new phone number
The user's new organization
(Optional) The user's new and unique Google Authentication Key
The user's new isAdmin state
UUID of the activity for the system

title: Me
name: Me
description: End point for user's to get their user information. This endpoint requires user's to be authenticated and to provide their access token in the request header.

Success 200.description: The user object being created/updated
The user's new name
The user's new email
The user's new phone number
The user's new organization
(Optional) The user's new and unique Google Authentication Key
The user's new isAdmin state
UUID of the activity for the system

title: PostUser
name: PostUser
description: Creates a new user, adds the user to the organization and returns the user as an object.

Parameter.description: The user's new name
The user's new email
The user's new phone number
The user's new organization
(Optional) The password to set for the user, optional on put
(Optional) The user's new and unique Google Authentication Key
The user's new isAdmin state

Success 200.description: The user object being created/updated
The user's new name
The user's new email
The user's new phone number
The user's new organization
(Optional) The user's new and unique Google Authentication Key
The user's new isAdmin state
UUID of the activity for the system

Errors.description: Unauthorized. You do not have permission to access this data.

title: UpdateUser
name: UpdateUser
description: Update a user with optional password update. Returns the updated user. Include "password" in body to change password. Enqueues an SQS job.

Parameter.description: The user's new name
The user's new email
The user's new phone number
The user's new organization
(Optional) The password to set for the user, optional on put
(Optional) The user's new and unique Google Authentication Key
The user's new isAdmin state

Success 200.description: The user object being created/updated
The user's new name
The user's new email
The user's new phone number
The user's new organization
(Optional) The user's new and unique Google Authentication Key
The user's new isAdmin state
UUID of the activity for the system

Errors.description: Unauthorized. You do not have permission to access this data.
